word:
The Work of Elder W. C. White 
 (Copied from diary, Dec. 14, 1902) 


               "Sunnyside," Cooranbong, 
                        N.S.W., Australia, 
                     August 18, 1899. 
     I awoke as the clock struck eleven. I desire to write out some things that the Lord has given me for my instruction.
